pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ bhattena nimantesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṃ, kulāni payirupāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.9: tatiyampi kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.11: “Yampi mayaṃ, bhante, bhattaṃ karimhā ayyassa upanandassa kāraṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.13: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṃ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.15: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.16: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.17: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.20: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.23: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.24: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ saṃghassatthāya khādanīyaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.4: Atha kho te manussā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.6: “Esāvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.7: “Idaṃ, bhante, khādanīyaṃ ayyassa upanandassa dassetvā saṃghassa dātabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.10: “tena hi, bhikkhave, paṭiggahetvā nikkhipatha yāva upanando āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.11: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ purebhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjitun”ti pacchābhattaṃ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā paṭikkami, khādanīyaṃ ussāriyittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.12: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.13: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.14: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.17: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.20: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.21: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaradānasamaye kukkuccāyantā kulāni na payirupāsanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.6: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.8: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ karonti, attho ca hoti sūciyāpi suttenapi satthakenapi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.6: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.7: Tatthāyaṃ samayo. Cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.8: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti, attho ca hoti bhesajjehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.4: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā kulāni payirupāsituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.6: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.7: Tatthāyaṃ samayo. Cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.16: yena nimantito taṃ antamaso kusaggenapi bhuttaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.18: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.21: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.26: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.1: Nimantite nimantitasaññī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.2: Nimantite vematiko santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.3: Nimantite animantitasaññī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
